subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Paranormal investigations!?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I see these sites with Hollywood images of demons and ghosts, and it makes 
me affraid that's what the expectation is. To be frightened, or seek the 
sensational.


I had other comments, but I doubt if it would come accross as anything but 
being negative, so I deleted that.  Suffice to say I still have doubts,  if 
no one else can use my boxes and get anything that resembles in the 
slightest what I get, I can't tell if the boxes work, and if few can hear 
the voices that I get, hearing instead broadcast fragments, I have to 
question my own perception. Even after seven years, I don't know what to 
make of this. Yes, there's something communicating in EVP, no, I don't know 
what "it" is, and no I don't think I have a good system yet.

Frank
